<a id="CryptoKey"></a>

# CryptoKey

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A cryptographic key (RSA or elliptic-curve).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The CryptoKey class represents a cryptographic key. Keys can be loaded and saved like any other [Resource](Resource.md).

They can be used to generate a self-signed [X509Certificate](X509Certificate.md) via [Crypto.generate_self_signed_certificate()](Crypto.md#Crypto_method_generate_self_signed_certificate) and as private key in [StreamPeerTLS.accept_stream()](StreamPeerTLS.md#StreamPeerTLS_method_accept_stream) along with the appropriate certificate.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [SSL certificates](../tutorials/networking/ssl_certificates.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="CryptoKey_method_is_public_only"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_public_only**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#CryptoKey_method_is_public_only)

Returns ``true`` if this CryptoKey only has the public part, and not the private one.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CryptoKey_method_load"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **load**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), public_only\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CryptoKey_method_load)

Loads a key from `path`. If `public_only` is ``true``, only the public key will be loaded.

\ **Note:** `path` should be a "\*.pub" file if `public_only` is ``true``, a "\*.key" file otherwise.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CryptoKey_method_load_from_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **load_from_string**\ (\ string_key\: [String](String.md), public_only\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CryptoKey_method_load_from_string)

Loads a key from the given `string_key`. If `public_only` is ``true``, only the public key will be loaded.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CryptoKey_method_save"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **save**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), public_only\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CryptoKey_method_save)

Saves a key to the given `path`. If `public_only` is ``true``, only the public key will be saved.

\ **Note:** `path` should be a "\*.pub" file if `public_only` is ``true``, a "\*.key" file otherwise.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CryptoKey_method_save_to_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **save_to_string**\ (\ public_only\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CryptoKey_method_save_to_string)

Returns a string containing the key in PEM format. If `public_only` is ``true``, only the public key will be included.
